metadata.Title: CVE-2017-13166 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description:
An elevation of privilege vulnerability in the kernel v4l2 video driver.Product: Android. Versions: Android kernel. Android ID A-34624167.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-13166` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.4.0-211-generic - 4.4.0-128.154
linux-image-unsigned-4.4.0-211-generic - 4.4.0-128.154
linux-image-unsigned-4.4.0-211-lowlatency - 4.4.0-128.154
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-4.4.0-1091-raspi2 - 4.4.0-1091.99
No subscription required

linux-image-4.4.0-1094-snapdragon - 4.4.0-1094.99
No subscription required

linux-image-4.4.0-1129-aws - 4.4.0-1061.70
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-4.15.0-143-generic - 4.15.0-24.26~16.04.1
linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-143-generic - 4.15.0-24.26~16.04.1
linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-143-lowlatency - 4.15.0-24.26~16.04.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-1114-azure - 4.15.0-1013.13~16.04.2
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-1099-gcp - 4.15.0-1014.14~16.04.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-4.4.0-1094-kvm - 4.4.0-1027.32
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-4.15.0-1102-aws - 4.15.0-1030.31~16.04.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-1071-oracle - 4.15.0-1007.9~16.04.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: linux package in esm-infra/xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.4.0-128.154').
linux-goldfish: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
